original_text: They have turned back to the iniquities of their forefathers, who refused to hear my words. They have gone after other gods to serve them. The house of Israel and the house of Judah have broken my covenant that I made with their fathers.
korean_text: 그들이 내 말 듣기를 거절한 자기들의 선조의 죄악으로 돌아가서 다른 신들을 따라 섬겼은즉 이스라엘 집과 유다 집이 내가 그들의 조상들과 맺은 언약을 깨뜨렸도다

sentences.original_text: They have turned back to the iniquities of their forefathers
who refused to hear my words
They have gone after other gods to serve them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 신들을 좇아 그들을 섬겼습니다

sentences.original_text: The house of Israel and the house of Judah have broken my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 족속과 유다 족속은 나의 언약을 어겼습니다

sentences.original_text: that I made with their fathers
